QueryResult.text: ( SELECT CONTENT.ID , CONTENT.OBJECT_TYPE_ID OBJECT_TYPE_ID , CONTENT.FEATURE FEATURE , CONTENT.FEATURE_TYPE FEATURE_TYPE , CONTENT.OBJECT_ID OBJECT_ID , CONTENT.NAME NAME , CONTENT.OWNER_ID OWNER_ID , USR.FIRST_NAME OWNER_FIRST_NAME , USR.LAST_NAME OWNER_LAST_NAME , CONTENT.PROJECT_ID PROJECT_ID , INVESTMENT.NAME PROJECT , CONTENT.CREATED_DATE CREATED_DATE , CONTENT.LAST_UPDATED_DATE LAST_UPDATED_DATE , APV.USER_ID USER_ID , CONTENT.SEC_OBJECT_TYPE_ID SEC_OBJECT_TYPE_ID , CONTENT.SEC_OBJECT_ID SEC_OBJECT_ID , '' LOCATION FROM INV_INVESTMENTS INVESTMENT, CMN_SEC_USERS USR , CLB_SEARCH_CONTENTS CONTENT , CLB_SEARCH_PERM_V APV WHERE CONTENT.FEATURE <> 'Activities' AND APV.OBJECT_ID = CONTENT.SEC_OBJECT_TYPE_ID AND APV.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = CONTENT.SEC_OBJECT_ID AND CONTENT.OWNER_ID = USR.ID AND CONTENT.PROJECT_ID = INVESTMENT.ID(+) )
